Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9057 affecting package terraform for versions less than 1.2.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-9057 affecting package terraform for versions less than 1.2.2-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package terraform is earlier than 1.2.2-2, affected by CVE-2018-9057
